Resource TypeProfileReadV-ReadSearchUpdateCreate
ActivityDefinitionhttp://ehealth.sundhed.dk/fhir/StructureDefinition/ehealth-activitydefinitionyyyyy
DocumentReferencehttp://ehealth.sundhed.dk/fhir/StructureDefinition/ehealth-documentreferenceyyyyy
OperationDefinitionhttp://hl7.org/fhir/Profile/OperationDefinitiony
PlanDefinitionhttp://ehealth.sundhed.dk/fhir/StructureDefinition/ehealth-plandefinitionyyyyy

searchParam.name: _content
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: _has
searchParam.documentation: Return resources linked to by the given target

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: _language
searchParam.documentation: The language of the resource

searchParam.name: _lastUpdated
searchParam.documentation: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

searchParam.name: _profile
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given profile

searchParam.name: _security
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given security labels

searchParam.name: _tag
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given tag

searchParam.name: _text
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: composed-of
searchParam.documentation: What resource is being referenced

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The activity definition publication date

searchParam.name: depends-on
searchParam.documentation: What resource is being referenced

searchParam.name: derived-from
searchParam.documentation: What resource is being referenced

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: The description of the activity definition

searchParam.name: effective
searchParam.documentation: The time during which the activity definition is intended to be in use

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: External identifier for the activity definition

searchParam.name: intendedAudience
searchParam.documentation: The intended audience of the plan definition

searchParam.name: jurisdiction
searchParam.documentation: Intended jurisdiction for the activity definition

searchParam.name: modifier_role_reference
searchParam.documentation: Reference to either Organization, CareTeam, Practitioner

searchParam.name: modifier_role_role
searchParam.documentation: Role of Organization, CareTeam, Practitioner

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Computationally friendly name of the activity definition

searchParam.name: predecessor
searchParam.documentation: What resource is being referenced

searchParam.name: publisher
searchParam.documentation: Name of the publisher of the activity definition

searchParam.name: recommendation
searchParam.documentation: Recommendation for the plan definition

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The current status of the activity definition

searchParam.name: successor
searchParam.documentation: What resource is being referenced

searchParam.name: title
searchParam.documentation: The human-friendly name of the activity definition

searchParam.name: topic
searchParam.documentation: Topics associated with the module

searchParam.name: url
searchParam.documentation: The uri that identifies the activity definition

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The business version of the activity definition

searchParam.name: _content
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: _has
searchParam.documentation: Return resources linked to by the given target

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: _language
searchParam.documentation: The language of the resource

searchParam.name: _lastUpdated
searchParam.documentation: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

searchParam.name: _profile
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given profile

searchParam.name: _security
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given security labels

searchParam.name: _tag
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given tag

searchParam.name: _text
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: authenticator
searchParam.documentation: Who/what authenticated the document

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who and/or what authored the document

searchParam.name: class
searchParam.documentation: Categorization of document

searchParam.name: created
searchParam.documentation: Document creation time

searchParam.name: custodian
searchParam.documentation: Organization which maintains the document

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Human-readable description (title)

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Context of the document  content

searchParam.name: event
searchParam.documentation: Main clinical acts documented

searchParam.name: facility
searchParam.documentation: Kind of facility where patient was seen

searchParam.name: format
searchParam.documentation: Format/content rules for the document

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Master Version Specific Identifier

searchParam.name: indexed
searchParam.documentation: When this document reference was created

searchParam.name: language
searchParam.documentation: Human language of the content (BCP-47)

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: Uri where the data can be found

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who/what is the subject of the document

searchParam.name: period
searchParam.documentation: Time of service that is being documented

searchParam.name: related-id
searchParam.documentation: Identifier of related objects or events

searchParam.name: related-ref
searchParam.documentation: Related Resource

searchParam.name: relatesto
searchParam.documentation: Target of the relationship

searchParam.name: relation
searchParam.documentation: replaces | transforms | signs | appends

searchParam.name: relationship
searchParam.documentation: Combination of relation and relatesTo

searchParam.name: securitylabel
searchParam.documentation: Document security-tags

searchParam.name: setting
searchParam.documentation: Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: current | superseded | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who/what is the subject of the document

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Kind of document (LOINC if possible)
